home.title: University Portal
home.subtitle: The central hub for managing your studies and university agenda.
home.login_description: Please login to access study data, course enrollment, and profile management.

cards.my_data_desc: Manage personal details, addresses, contacts, and bank accounts.
cards.study_desc: Overview of grades, exams, and study plans.
cards.schedule_desc: Your current class schedule and room reservations.
cards.news_desc: Important announcements from the rectorate and faculties.

public.portal_desc: Access all your personal information, study results, and university correspondence in one secure place.
public.scheduling_desc: Manage your timetable, sign up for exams, and book rooms for study sessions or events.
public.academics_desc: Track your academic progress, view study plans, and download necessary documents and certificates.
